text: Alberto Johannes Först (November 26, 1926 - November 1, 2014) was a Roman Catholic bishop. Ordained to the priesthood on June 29, 1952, Först was named coadjutor bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Dourados, Brazil, on July 6, 1988, and was ordained bishop on September 7, 1988. He became diocesan bishop on May 12, 1990, and retired on December 5, 2001.Alberto Johannes Forst ==Notes== Category:1926 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Brazilian Roman Catholic bishops
title: Alberto Johannes Först
